title: Steve Sisolak
deleted: Sisolak's move to change the formula for distribution of funds by the Legislative Interim Finance Committee was termed as "declaration of war"<ref>{{Cite web|date=1999-06-21|title=Chancellor status next up for board - Las Vegas Sun Newspaper|url=https://lasvegassun.com/news/1999/jun/21/chancellor-status-next-up-for-board/|access-date=2021-09-16|website=lasvegassun.com|language=en}}</ref> by the UNR President [[Joe Crowley]] as he believed it naive to think the money was distributed solely on the number of students. Sisolak's action reflects his anti-Northern bias and unswerving political support for the South. According to [[Joe Crowley|Joe]], the allocation and distribution of funds was also based on graduate education and the research. Sisolak was meant to go to war in real as it was confirmed by his reply to Joe Crowely's remark in which he said "prepared to go to war"<ref>{{Cite web|date=1999-06-21|title=Chancellor status next up for board - Las Vegas Sun Newspaper|url=https://lasvegassun.com/news/1999/jun/21/chancellor-status-next-up-for-board/|access-date=2021-09-16|website=lasvegassun.com|language=en}}</ref>  due to his view that sourther students had been dispossessed of their fair share for so long. Sisolak took personally <ref>{{Cite web|date=1999-06-21|title=Chancellor status next up for board - Las Vegas Sun Newspaper|url=https://lasvegassun.com/news/1999/jun/21/chancellor-status-next-up-for-board/|access-date=2021-09-16|website=lasvegassun.com|language=en}}</ref> Joe Crowley's remark about "declaration of war" that culminated in [[Joe Crowley|Joe]] public apology.

title: Steve Sisolak
added: When he was a Regent at the university, he opposed dropping "Reno" from its name, and supported a uniform marketing of the institution that includes "Reno".<ref name="UoNR">{{Cite web |url= https://lasvegassun.com/news/2004/aug/05/university-ordered-to-put-the-r-back-in-unr/

title: Steve Sisolak
added: Sisolak won a $6.5 million domain judgement from Clark County in 2006.<ref>{{Cite web |url=https://lasvegassun.com/news/2008/oct/19/allegation-against-consultant-might-ripple/ |title= Allegation against consultant might ripple |date= 19 October 2008 |author= Joe Schoenmann |publisher= The Las Vegas Sun}}</ref>
